full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 118 of 236 LC3KMAX4 Parkinson - Direct 1 THE COURT: Thank you. GX 201 through 222 are admitted. And you may publish. (Government's Exhibits 201 through 222 received in evidence) MS. COMEY: Thank you, your Honor. BY MS. COMEY: Q. I want to walk through a subset of these. Let's talk about Government Exhibit 202. Mr. Parkinson, can you tell us what we're looking at here? A. Yes. You are standing at the entrance to the driveway, which is located on the east side of the property, and it shows a garage, which is attached to the main house, and also to the left is the barracks. MS. COMEY: Let's go now to Government Exhibit 206, please, Ms. Drescher. Q. Mr. Parkinson, what do we see here? A. This is a patio, you're standing south looking north, and I believe this leads into the kitchen. MS. COMEY: Let's go now to Government Exhibit 209, please. Q. Can you tell us what we see here? A. Yes. This is -- you're standing east and looking west. The building on the right is actually the garden room, first floor. There's an edge of a building on the far left, which is SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012632
